column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: The body of a 14-year-old boy was found in the garbage dump of KSWM in Sihanoukville
column4: Sihanoukville.------Preliminary information says the corpse was found decomposing in the garbage pile of KSWM Company in Village 2
column6: Sihanoukville.------Initial reports suggest that the deceased is thought to be a teenager who was reported missing by his family 3 days ago. More information will be released later. KPSBN------UPDATE: Police initially believe the victim may have been picking up the cans on the dump and got caught in a machine
